name: Vince Hodges
body:
### Welcome.
I am a software developer living in Mission BC.  I've been writing code for over 35 years in a variety of languages and platforms.  For the past ten years, I've been building Rails apps (mostly for failed startups) and lately I've been working more and more with Go. 

I currently work at [Talemetry](http://talemetry.com/) where we do recruitment marketing software. I also maintain some open source side projects:

### [Cashbook Toolkit](http://cashbooktoolkit.com) 
Cashbook is a suite of tools for building personal finance apps for banks and credit unions.  It's a mix of Go and Rails.

### [Dovetail](http://dovetail.io) 
Dovetail is community management software geared towards coworking spaces.  It provides basic member management along with billing and meeting room scheduling.  It's a Rails app.

### Contact/Links
* Email: vhodges@gmail.com
* Twitter: http://twitter.com/sourdoughlabs
* Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/vhodges
* Linkedin: https://www.linkedin.com/in/vincehodges
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
